pos review: Everything was fine,good location,nice staff,clean rooms.
neg review: The room should have a little fridge,on description says that the rooms are soundproof,but they aren't.

pos review: Standard double room was good. Great shower.

neg review: Very small rooms, not a working environment

pos review: Staffs were very friendly and helpful.The cleaning department cleaned the rooms each time we went out for sight seeings.And also kitchen staffs gave food fresh and hot.Good and quiet Location despite the motorway not far off.
neg review: Nothing I can think of.Wished we had a bigger room for the whole family instead of using two rooms.
WiFi never worked in my room. Walking distance from the bus stop but needed to cross busy roads so not very pleasant walking, especially there were many bikes not care about walking people at all.

pos review: Average hotel, no positive or negative surprise. Friendly staff, clean room. Free parking is almost unique in belgium so I gave 3 extra points for this. It saved us a lot of money. Bus stop near the hotel. You're in the city within 15 minutes. If I'm coming back to Antwerpen I'll book this hotel again.

neg review: The elevator was not working and we had to lug the bags up narrow stairs. No a/c.
